mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, name, pass, email, telNum) VALUES ( #{ id }, #{ name }, #{ pass }, #{ email }, #{ telNum } )
mapper.select: SELECT id, pass, name, email, telNum FROM member WHERE id = #{ 0 } AND pass = #{ 1 }
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET email = #{ email }, telNum = #{ telNum } where id = #{ id }
